name: The Lonely Cultist
description:
You play a lonely cultist in a village and your goal is to summon a demon by sacrificing some sheeps

Use the ARROWS to move and SPACE to pick up sheeps
Press ESC to quit

This game was made for the spooktober-jam-2021
The theme is sacrifice
I have made a lot of horror game and I wanted to try something different so here is some action game

I wanted to make a special ending screen but I cannot make a this drawing in this limited time so I guess it would be a potential update for later ^^

Assets :
https://franuka.itch.io/rpg-townsfolk-pack
https://samuellee.itch.io/reaper-animated-pixel-art
https://szadiart.itch.io/houses-pack
